about_the_game:
Yup That's Music all right

Yo, did you want the music to enjoy outside the game? Here ya go. Yeah, they're... music files so um... they're in wav and mp3 format so that might be better I guess? This feels really short for a description so uh, how you been doing? You doin good? Well, I can't hear your response so sorry if not but hell yeah if you are. Hopefully, the music will put a smile on your face. =)
detailed_description:
Yup That's Music all right

Yo, did you want the music to enjoy outside the game? Here ya go. Yeah, they're... music files so um... they're in wav and mp3 format so that might be better I guess? This feels really short for a description so uh, how you been doing? You doin good? Well, I can't hear your response so sorry if not but hell yeah if you are. Hopefully, the music will put a smile on your face. =)

name: Self Defense Kinda... Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 64 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 700 MB available space

short_description: Hopefully, you enjoyed the game. The OST took a lot of effort too. So if you want to enjoy the tracks independently of the game here's your chance. Either way, the songs will still be fire.
